name: BlorbSitter (LD50)
description:
Have you ever wanted to care for your own cute little Blorb?! No? Well, that's okay because their average life span is only two weeks anyway.

Look after your pet in every way in this short, tamagotchi-style, pet sim game.

Warning: This game contains content that some users could find disturbing.  If you are not an adult, or you are emotionally fragile, please don't play.

This is my 2nd time doing the LD jam, I had a lot of fun this time. I think I made something quite different from what I usually do.

All assets and code produced by myself.
